## Read csv data and EDA
```{r}
#| code-fold: false
pacman::p_load(rstatix, gt, patchwork, tidyverse)

financial<- read_csv("data/FinancialJournal.csv",show_col_types = FALSE)
glimpse(financial,width=NULL)

```

```{r}
#| code-fold: false
participants <- read_csv("data/Participants.csv",show_col_types = FALSE)
glimpse(participants,width=NULL)
```
## Checking missing value
```{r}
#| code-fold: true
#| code-summary: "Show the code"
apply(financial[c("participantId", "timestamp","category","amount")], 2, function(x) sum(is.na(x)))

```
## Checking duplicate rows
```{r}
#| code-fold: true
#| code-summary: "Show the code"
financial %>%
  distinct(participantId, timestamp, category, amount, .keep_all = TRUE) %>%
  group_by(participantId, timestamp, category, amount) %>%
  filter(n() > 1) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  as_tibble()


```
